title: What tf is this packaging. Has this happened to anyone else?
selftext: I didn't join shit. How to opt out from this ðŸ˜­.
comments: It's good packaging. There is already a box, so it doesn't make sense to pack it in another box. Though, the wire shouldn't have been sent without packaging.

Yes, recently in two cases. One time a birthday gift toy which was not packed and original packing totally mangled due to the way their courier guys handle. Couldn't return due to lack of time. 

Another instance of they sent mens briefs in original packing.
Yes it's a box cost saving strategy. You gon throw the box anyway so why rant ? If it's damaged send it back . Simple
This is common now, especially for one day/same day delivery. They sent my Rs 14000 Amazon Kindle with no extra box.
Now they are just putting bill stickers
didnâ€™t opt in to save the environment? yea, opt out, let the planet dieâ€¦

There is a small issue with that logic. If the item was damaged due to poor packing,it will be returned by the customer and the advantage of environment friendly package is lost.

So environment friendly package shall be used for non fragile items and for items with their own damage proof box.

The initiative is good if properly implemented.
Amazon doesnâ€™t give two shits about the environment. This is just an excuse to lower their packaging costs at warehouse level
It is always about the money.
